In England, in the seven days to 27 February, there were 48,656 new confirmed cases (86.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 February, there were 66,764 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (18,108 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 March is 3,679,671 (6,537.3 cases per 100,000 population).
